Package game.core

Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.core.GameWorld
public final class GameWorld extends city.cs.engine.World
Extends World and represents the game world.
Since:
30-01-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the game's pause state.

      Since Game.togglePause() is not static, it can be accessed through 'Game.gameWorld.togglePause()'.

    • useInventoryItem

      public void useInventoryItem(int index)
      Uses an item from the player's inventory at the specified index.
      index corresponds to the item's visual position in the inventory. starting from the left.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the item to use
